one-way.translation[0].definitions[0].de: a one-way street is one in which vehicles are only allowed to travel in one direction
one-way.translation[0].definitions[1].de: a one-way ticket is for travelling from one place to another but not back again
one-way.translation[0].definitions[2].de: a one-way process, relationship etc is one in which only one person makes any effort or provides anything
